title: BACKUP & RESTORE all application from PRODUCTION to PROD-LIKE and TEST

task_list.instruction_title:
On the** CUTOVER DATE** proceed with the following **BACKUP **and **RESTORE **activities.

On **PRODUCTION**: **BACKUP **all applications related to migration based on **EOW/EOM** data
On **PROD LIKE**: **RESTORE** all applications based on  **PRODUCTION **backup made on step DUM-12119-1
On **TEST**: **RESTORE ****SECLI **and **ATLAS **based on **PRODUCTION **Backup made on step DUM-12119-1
